graphQLQueries.random: query randomQuestion($categorySlug: String, $filters: QuestionListFilterInput){randomQuestion(categorySlug: $categorySlug, filters: $filters){title titleSlug difficulty likes stats topicTags{name}}}
graphQLQueries.specific: query questionData($titleSlug: String!){question(titleSlug: $titleSlug){title titleSlug difficulty isPaidOnly likes stats topicTags{name}}}
